summary: An ordinance relating to the use of Lots 1 to 14, inclusive, an unnumbered Lot adjoining Lot 7 and an unnumbered Lot adjoining Lot 8, Block 23, Replat of Fred E. Sanders Acre Tracts, located on the south side of Juneau Street, between Swift Avenue and 16th Avenue South; rezoning said property for business uses and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections, numbered 2-6 and 17-5, respectively.
